description:
改写句子：
　　1.Lucy did her homework at home.
        (改否定句)Lucy ________ _______ her homework at home.
　　2.He found some meat in the fridge(冰箱).
        (变一般疑问句)___________ he __________ ___________ meat in the fridge?
　　3.There was some orange in the cup.
        (变一般疑问句)_______ there _______ orange in the cup?
　　4. Frank read an interesting book about history.
         (一般疑问句)_______ Frank _______ an interesting book about history?
　　5. Why not go out for a walk?
        (同义句) _______ ________ ________ out for a walk?
     6.She stayed there for a week.
       (对划线部分提问) __________ ___________ __________ she __________ there?
     7.There was some orange in the cup.
       (变一般疑问句) _________ there ___________ orange in the cup?
翻译下列句子:
　 1.Jenny喜欢看书。昨晚她看了一本英语书。
　　Jenny likes _________ __________. She _________ an English book last night.
    2.Emma每天都看电视。可是昨天他没有看。
　　Emma__________ TV every day. But he _________ ________ ________ yesterday.
　 3. 上周六他们做什么了?他们做作业和购物了。
　　What ________ they _________ _________ Saturday?
　　They _________ __________ homework and _________ __________.
　 4. 今天早上方方得做饭，因为他父亲不在家。
　　This morning Fangfang ____ ____ ____ ____ because his father _____ _____ ____ yesterday.
    5.我的故事书刚才还在手表旁边。
       ___________________________________________________________
　 6．他们的外套上个礼拜放在卧室里了。
       ___________________________________________________________
　 7．一会以前花园里有两只小鸟。
        ___________________________________________________________
    8. 昨天我们参观了农场。
       ________________________________________________________
　 9. 他刚才在找他的手机。
       ________________________________________________________
　 10. 上周六他们做什么了？他们做作业和购物了。
　　What ________ they _________ _________ Saturday?
　　They _________ __________ homework and _________ __________.

  • “美队”空降北京：钢铁侠美队要打群架了！

title: 一般过去时专项练习（3）

description:
单项选择：
 (   )1． My father＿＿＿＿＿＿ill yesterday． 　
      A． isn't   B． aren't      C． wasn't  D． weren't 　
 (   )2． ＿＿＿＿＿＿your parents at home last week﹖ 　
   　A． Is       B． Was          C． Are  D． Were 　　
 (   )3． The  twins＿＿＿＿＿＿in Dalian  last year． They＿＿＿＿＿＿here now． 　　
      A． are; were    B． were; are   C． was; are        D． were; was  　
 (   )4. ______your father at work the day_____yesterday(前天)﹖
　　A. Was; before B. Is; before C. Was; after D. Is; after
 (   )5. —Who was on duty last Friday﹖
　　—______.
　　A. I am B. I was C. Yes, I was D. No, I wasn't
请选择正确的词，把下列句子补充完整。
   1. I _____________ （ask / asked / is asking） him a question yesterday. 
　2. Tom _____________ （read / is reading / reads） English now.
　3. Did you ______________ （water / watered / waters） flowers last week?
　4. Let’s _____________ （get / got / getting） on the No. 1 bus.
　5. We often ___________ （watch / watches / watched） TV at home.
  6. Judy didn’t ____________ （went / go / going） to school yesterday.答
　7. His dad ______________ （works / worked / is working） hard every day.
　8. There ____________ （were / are / was） some trees near houses two years ago.
　9. My cousin ____________ （studies / studied / study） in a middle school in Guangzhou.
　10. Mr. White _____________ （came / comes / is coming） China last year.
　11. She is going to ___________ （have / had / has） a big party this Sunday.
